channel.title: Anbox install trouble handshake failure
channel.description:
Currently following guide from wiki
non-qubes whonix install `scurl --tlsv1.3 --remote-name https://build.anbox.io/android-images/2018/07/19/android_amd64.img` `curl: (35) error:14094410:SSL routines:ssl3_read_bytes:sslv3 alert handshake failure`

item.title: Anbox install trouble handshake failure
item.dc:creator: nyxnor
item.description:
If you read the subdomain build.anbox.io certificate, they are using TLS 1.2, so try scurl --tlsv1.2
The domain anbox.io is on TLS 1.3

Read full topic

item.title: Anbox install trouble handshake failure
item.dc:creator: whome23
item.description:
Currently following guide from wiki

non-qubes whonix install
scurl --tlsv1.3 --remote-name https://build.anbox.io/android-images/2018/07/19/android_amd64.img
curl: (35) error:14094410:SSL routines:ssl3_read_bytes:sslv3 alert handshake failure
